title: 247: The Other Side of the Fourth Wall
itunes:title: The Other Side of the Fourth Wall
description: Master podcaster and chronicler of Hardcore History, Dan Carlin joins the conversation to discuss his process, the war in Ukraine, and the pitfalls of judging yesterday's events with today's values.
itunes:author: The Way I Heard It with Mike Rowe
dc:creator: The Way I Heard It with Mike Rowe
